message: I didn't know if anyone was aware of any libraries or Django apps that provided support for either consuming OData or providing it?
i would think the point of using regular web technologies is you can use the libraries that already exist for them.
this reads like adding a generally unnecessary abstraction layer over plain web APIs.
A quick google would seem to indicate that there's not much Python/Django support in the community for OData: http://www.odata.org/

@markpasc That's a good question, we were looking around at API technologies at my office and I was doing my due diligence. Between OData's lack of community enthusiasm and lack of a compelling reason to use it over just POJSON (plain ole JSON) I'm not bowled over :-)
